greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of quotient of a Ramanujan false theta series by the theta series of triangular numbers in powers of x.
reference: S. Ramanujan, The Lost Notebook and Other Unpublished Papers, Narosa Publishing House, New Delhi, 1988, p. 41, 13th equation.
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QHypergeometricPFQ[ {x}, {x^2}, x^2, x^3], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Sep 07 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( sum(k=0, n, if( issquare( 3*k + 1, &m), (-1)^(m \ 3) * x^k ), A) / sum(k=0, (sqrtint(8*n + 1) - 1) \ 2, x^((k^2 + k) / 2), A), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jul 21 2008
